divs: sighting detailssighting time: 10:50 pm day\night: nighttime no. of witnesses: one duration: 20 seconds summary: nine to twelve fat boomerang shaped objects closely spaced together flying north, ominously silent and dark metallic in color, without any visible lights. at 10:50 pm before going to bed on monday december 13th 2004, i wanted to catch sight of at least a couple of the geminids meteors. it was their peak viewing night. it was a brilliantly clear and essentially moonless night, painfully crisp and cold. the sky was not a dark black, but a luminous satiny rich dark royal blue. i walked east on my driveway towards my back yard. a large, dark gray shadowy mass flying north, immediately caught my eyes. i focused on what appeared to be at least nine to twelve fat boomerang shaped objects, more accurately; these were kidney bean shaped objects, closely spaced and asymmetrical in formation. without a sound these objects smoothly glided across the sky. these objects were dark, not a glimmer of light on any of them. i was only able to view them for 15 to 20 seconds, when my neighbor's tree obscured my view. i ran around like a maniac trying to catch an other glimpse, but i did not. they were not flying at a high rate of speed, but in a steady calculated manner. these objects were not clouds, migrating birds of stealth bombers as family and friends have volunteered. i am a mature pragmatic woman, that acknowledges that we live in wondrous universe which we know very little about. i have reported this to an other ufo website after it happened, but today i decided to include my sighting to mufon and to specifically the missouri site. it's been almost five years and i still think about this experience frequently.
Summary: Nine to twelve fat metallic boomerang shaped objects, no lights, no sound.
